snippet: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta announced the money-saving steps, which are designed to be reversible should a compromise be reached on federal spending.
abstract: Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta announces that Pentagon is freezing civilian hiring, limiting maintenance work and delaying approval of some contracts; money-saving steps are designed to be reversible should a compromise be reached on federal spending.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta announced the money-saving steps, which are designed to be reversible should a compromise be reached on federal spending.

headline.main: Pentagon Acts to Limit Spending in Case Cutbacks Begin in March
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Acts to Limit Spending In Case Cutbacks Begin in March

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
